content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 24-31)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler (position -5.0, 2.5) - now fueled with coal
- Steam engine (position 0.5, 6.5)
- Connected pipe network (positions -8.5,-0.5 to -5.5,0.5)
- Small electric pole (position 0.5, 3.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Operation at position (19.5, 74.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position 19.5, 74.5)
- Wooden chest for ore collection (position 19.5, 76.5)
- Two stone furnaces (positions 20.0, 78.0 and 23.0, 78.0)
- Inserters (positions 21.5, 78.5 and 24.5, 78.5)
- Output wooden chest (position 25.5, 78.5)
- Connected with power poles (positions 10.5,45.5 to 31.5,46.5)

### New Steel Production Line at position (22.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
- Input wooden chest (position 22.5, 15.5)
- Steel furnace (position 25.0, 15.0)
- Output wooden chest (position 28.5, 15.5)
- Inserter (position 23.5, 15.5)
- Connected to power network

### Iron Smelting Column at position (12.0, 15.0)
Consists of:
- Three stone furnaces (positions 12.0,15.0; 12.0,17.0; 12.0,19.0)
- Connected to power network

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent placement collision errors
- Verify empty space before placing entities (steps 24,29,30)
- Increase spacing between furnaces and inserters (minimum 1 tile)
- Clear existing entities completely before new constructions

### Belt connection issues
- Always use inserters between furnaces and belts (steps 28,31)
- Verify belt connection directions match flow requirements
- Check for obstructions along entire belt path

### Power network problems
- Correct attribute access for power pole objects (step 25)
- Verify proper Direction object usage in placement (step 26)
- Monitor power coverage when expanding operations

### Production line setup errors
- Ensure furnaces have both fuel and ingredients (step 31)
- Verify inserter pickup/drop positions are accessible
- Check power connections for all production components

### Inventory inspection failures
- Verify entity existence before inventory checks (step 27)
- Use correct coordinate references for chests
- Monitor output chest capacity regularly

### API usage improvements
- Use proper entity references in placement functions
- Verify object attributes before accessing
- Handle error cases gracefully in production setup

## NAMESPACE

### Important Variables
- iron_patch: Position | None - Stores location of iron ore resources
- power_pole: Position - Reference to power infrastructure location
- steel_furnace: Entity - Reference to steel production furnace
- iron_furnaces: List[Entity] - References to iron smelting furnaces
- output_chests: List[Entity] - References to production output storage
- belt_network: List[Entity] - References to transport belt system
